body: I agree with your latter point.  If I recall correctly, it would require that the element counting code within the ND array codepath be moved from C to Java.  Since we have `flattenedNumElements` in the managed test code anyway, I have no objection.
body_html: I agree with your latter point. If I recall correctly, it would require that the element counting code within the ND array codepath be moved from C to Java. Since we have flattenedNumElements in the managed test code anyway, I have no objection.
body_text: I agree with your latter point.  If I recall correctly, it would require that the element counting code within the ND array codepath be moved from C to Java.  Since we have flattenedNumElements in the managed test code anyway, I have no objection.
